about_the_game:
Galaxy Legion: Apotheosis is a Sci-Fi RPG Adventure set in an open, persistent universe. Pick a species and a ship of your choice, and uncover the mysteries of the Farselle Galaxy as you earn skills, improve your ship, and grow your fleet and power.

Explore: Use your ship to travel to a variety of planets, stations, stars, and belts. Hail and speak to other characters to receive insight, clues, and skills along your journey.

Gather: Visit planetary mines and extraction areas to acquire valuable materials you can use for crafting, trade, and research.

Research: Unlock powerful new discoveries and upgrades for your ship, and expand your construction options

Build: Use your materials to assemble new and advanced modules, upgrades, and implants for your crew.

Recruit: Hire pilots, engineers, and other members to join your ship, combining their skills with your own. Improve your crew with training, implants, and genetic manipulation.

Battle: Use your weapons to engage in combat with other vessels, space entities, and other players around the galaxy. Hide your ship with cloaking devices to avoid combat, or give it an advantage with sneak attacks.

Your choices have a lasting impact on the Galaxy: whether it is from polluting worlds, lobbying new laws, or engaging in criminal activity. Who will you become?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Mojave 10.14
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 quad-core or Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics or Apple M1 integrated GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur 11.0 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 six-core or Apple M1 Pro / Max
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU like AMD Radeon Pro 5300M or better, or Apple M1 Pro / Max integrated GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
